title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, create and delete models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; identical API surface to JS client plus sync/async support and native iterators.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate and embeddings inside LangChain LLM & embedding classes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, admin panel and dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting sync/async, streaming, custom timeouts and POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list and delete models with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper written in Go that adds chat history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates to the native ollama command.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU stacks, and example apps (Flask, Next.js, Tauri).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models, supports slash commands and per-channel model settings.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Custom n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows for summarization, translation, classification tasks.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama via REST, includes session memory and model selector widgets.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-dependent code without cloud keys.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models for content generation or classification steps.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, streaming, cancellation tokens and dependency injection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain in a single Docker Compose stack.
